name: Lightquest (Gl0bul)
description:
Graphics from  craftpix.net and https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles

Sound effects & musics from www.sound-fishing.net

Thanks to www.gamecodeur.fr for everything I learn and use.

The game : Loot the 3 keys from the mobs in the maze to go out. Use arrow keys to move and spacebar to hit mobs. [Escape] to restart.

Coded in LUA/Love2D

Resolution (windowed) : 1080*720
